text: Fantastic gaming laptop for the price. Getting amazing FPS in Elden Ring and Starfield. The build quality of the ASUS GL503VM-IH73 15.6" Intel Core i7 7th Gen 7700HQ (2.80 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 16 GB Memory 128 GB M.2 SATA SSD 1 TB HDD Windows 10 Home 64-Bit Gaming Laptop is solid, and the build material is a joy to use. A definite 5 stars!

The ASUS GL503VM-IH73 15.6" Intel Core i7 7th Gen 7700HQ (2.80 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 16 GB Memory 128 GB M.2 SATA SSD 1 TB HDD Windows 10 Home 64-Bit Gaming Laptop does what it says on the tin. Good for AAA gaming, but the build material could be better. Had a minor issue with driver updates being a bit tricky, but it was resolved. Solid, but not spectacular.

Absolutely love this laptop! The performance for gaming is incredible, especially the NVIDIA GTX 1060. Boots up super fast and handles everything I throw at it. The screen brightness is also top-notch. Highly recommend for anyone looking for a beast like the ASUS GL503VM-IH73 15.6" Intel Core i7 7th Gen 7700HQ (2.80 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 16 GB Memory 128 GB M.2 SATA SSD 1 TB HDD Windows 10 Home 64-Bit Gaming Laptop!

It's a decent gaming laptop for the money. Performance is good for most games like Elden Ring, but it can struggle a bit with the newest AAA titles on ultra settings with the ASUS GL503VM-IH73 15.6" Intel Core i7 7th Gen 7700HQ (2.80 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 16 GB Memory 128 GB M.2 SATA SSD 1 TB HDD Windows 10 Home 64-Bit Gaming Laptop. The speakers is okay, not great. Overall, it gets the job done.

Absolutely love this laptop! The performance for streaming games is incredible, especially the NVIDIA GTX 1060. Boots up super fast and handles everything I throw at it. The build material is also top-notch. Highly recommend for anyone looking for a beast like the ASUS GL503VM-IH73 15.6" Intel Core i7 7th Gen 7700HQ (2.80 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 16 GB Memory 128 GB M.2 SATA SSD 1 TB HDD Windows 10 Home 64-Bit Gaming Laptop!
